generic.defaultDMResponse: This bot does not have any handling for direct messages. To learn more or get help please visit %s, or join my Discord server here: %s

help.description: Display information about commands available to you

addFeed.description: Add an RSS feed to be posted in a channel, with an optional role to tag

removeFeed.description: Remove an RSS feed by it's ID

viewFeeds.description: View a list of configured feeds and their associated details
